SanaeClayVolcano.Name: Clay Volcano
SanaeClayVolcano.Description: Whenever the draw pile is shuffled, gain <Value1 /> <h>Temporary Spirit</h>.

SanaeExhibitU.Name: Snakespiral Accessory
SanaeExhibitU.Description:
Adds to the mana base. Cards unique to Sanae are added to the card pool.
After activates her Spell Card, gain Block.

SanaeExhibitW.Name: Froggish Hairclip
SanaeExhibitW.Description:
Adds to the mana base. Cards unique to Sanae are added to the card pool.
At the start of the first turn each combat, gain Ward.

SanaeExpiredCoupon.Name: Expired Coupon
SanaeExpiredCoupon.Description: After <PlayerName /> activates her <h>Spell Card</h> for the first time each combat, gain <Value1 /> <Power />.

SanaeLibraryCard.Name: Library Card
SanaeLibraryCard.Description: At the start of <PlayerName />'s turn, if no attack cards were played last turn, gain <Value1 /> <h>Ward</h>.

BlackSun.Name: Black Sun
BlackSun.Description: Adds <Mana /> to the mana base. Cards unique to <h>Utsuho</h> are added to the card pool. When the Draw pile is shuffled, deal <Value1 /> damage to each enemy for each card in the Discard pile.

ControlRod.Name: Control Rod
ControlRod.Description: Adds <Mana /> to the mana base. Cards unique to <h>Utsuho</h> are added to the card pool. Whenever a card is played, gain 1 <h>Heat</h>.

YoumuExhibitG.Name: Honed Roukanken
YoumuExhibitG.Description:
Adds to the mana base. Cards unique to Youmu are added to the card pool.
At the start of combat, apply Lock On to each enemy.
Enemies do not lose Lock on at the start of each turn.

YoumuExhibitW.Name: Hakurouken
YoumuExhibitW.Description:
Adds to the mana base. Cards unique to Youmu are added to the card pool.
At the start of the Player's first turn each combat, add Slash of Present to the hand.
